snippet: "The American Presidential Experience," a traveling exhibit, has landed in Charlotte, N.C., to coincide with the Democratic National Convention. Above, Jyoti Vashee taking a photograph of her children, Shivali, 13, and Rushil, 9, at the exhibit's...
abstract: "The American Presidential Experience," a traveling exhibit, has landed in Charlotte, N.C., to coincide with the Democratic National Convention. Above, Jyoti Vashee taking a photograph of her children, Shivali, 13, and Rushil, 9, at the exhibit's mock Oval Office.
